law.catch_line: Allocation Of Revenues Under Secs. 2 M To 2 O To Commonwealth Liability Reduction Fund
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 112. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] Allocation of revenues under sections two M, two N and two O and to the Commonwealth Liability Reduction Fund established by chapter two hundred and eighty-seven of the acts of nineteen hundred and eighty-nine shall be determined by the commissioner of revenue according to his best information and belief.
